item.title: Peter Schiff Questions Trump’s Tariff Claims As President Flaunts $2K Per-Capita Dividend To Americans, Claiming All-Around Prosperity
item.description: Trump’s efforts at salvaging his tariffs were met with skepticism by an economist, who sees an overall net negative impact on the economy.
